name: newStructure
goal: The goal of this learning journey is to learn about data protection.

steps.name: When passwords get stolen
steps.goal: The student knows the reasons behind credential/identity theft.
steps.behavior: Explain to the user why stolen passwords can be a threat to them and their data.

step.name: 2FA
step.goal: The student knows means to check if their credentials got stolen.
step.behavior: Explain to the student where they can check for stolen passwords or emails.

intent.name: Quiz
intent.goal: The student should answer a short quiz on identity theft and 2FA.

capabilities.name: Quiz Mode
capabilities.behavior: Engage students in quizzes to test knowledge on data protection.

step.name: 2FA
step.behavior: Explain to the user why 2FA is important and how it can better secure their accounts.

intent.name: Exam Intent
intent.goal: The student should choose how they would like to deepen their knowledge on data security.

capabilities.name: Quiz Mode
capabilities.behavior: Engage students in quizzes to test knowledge on data protection.

capabilities.name: Creativity Mode
capabilities.behavior: Encourage students to create data protection projects.
